At 02:27 20/06/2004, you wrote:
>John Arrowwood wrote:
>
> >>From: Ian Badcoe <ian_badcoe@...>
> >>
> >>
> >BTW:  Thanks for sharing your insight into optimization.  It really is
> >appreciated.  And helpful!
> >
> >
> >
>Certainly has. My initial test was somewhat lacking so I decided to bite
>the bullet and have written a new optimized neural net class to test
>some of the theories/ideas posted on the list. Result? Currently I'm
>looking at about a 12x speedup on very large networks and about 3x on
>smaller, more realsitic networks. I may have to sacrifice a little bit
>of this to get dynamic activation fucntions back, but yeh, nice result
>huh :)

Nice :)

Now move on to "ludicrously large" networks (tm).

But seriously, I'm glad to have been useful.

         Ian Badcoe
